blocks.text: Billy Barker Casino: Things to Know Before Betting in This Canadian Casino

items: 132 gaming machines
1M jackpot
Reputable and licensed

blocks.text: In 1960, a new hotel for Quesnel was announced to be open by a GROUP of Prince George businessmen. Initially, it was designed as a mere hotel to welcome guests with private bath and telephone services in each room. However, the popularity of the hotel grew, and its founders decided to add more entertainment and facilities to stay compatible. In 1965, it got a new owner, who designed and constructed a new floor. In 1987, it got its casino floor.

At first, its name was Royal Casino. Its birth date was January, 1987. Its initial look isn’t preserved as it was renovated in 1999. The exterior was renewed as the prior goal to make it look like a Paddlewheel ship similar to those that plied the Fraser River up until 1920.
It was not the final renovation step. Later, in 2014 the entire hotel had a relaxing atmosphere, and the casino got its lobby, a new elevator, and a separate entrance.

Today, the complex includes the hotel, the casino, the restaurant, and showrooms for different events. You can find Billy Barker Casino at 308 McLean Street, Quesnel, British Columbia V2J 2N9 in Canada.
Details About Login, Deposits, and Withdrawals
Billy Barker casino requires a physical presence as it is an entirely offline casino. Just like all brick-and-mortar casinos, it has its set of rules to follow.

items: Players must be at least 19 to be allowed to gambling.
All players pass a verification to prove their eligibility.
They must have documents issued by the Canadian government to prove their age.
All intoxicated players cannot enter the casino.
Players with illegal items and substances among their belongings are also not welcomed.
Players whose clothing promotes some gangs cannot enter the casino.
The casinos cannot be accepted if they are registered at the Self Exclusion programs.
All visitors must not use improper or offensive language neither to other visitors nor to the casino staff.

blocks.text: So, before visiting the casino, punters must have their IDs or Driving license issued in Canada to prove their legal age. They must stay away from alcohol drinks before entering the lobby and be not under the influence of any other intoxicating substances. Vulgar clothing is also unacceptable for visitors.
Pros and Cons of Billy Barker Casino
Billy Barker Casino has a long history. Along with it, it has a couple of benefits and negative sides:
Pros to experience

items: A reputable casino with an updated license
Regular promos, enlisted on the Facebook calendar
A beneficial location near the hotel and restaurant;
Responsible gambling support by Game Sense;
A loyalty program for regular visitors

blocks.text: Cons to highlight

items: A limited number of slots machines;
Only slots and roulette (no card games)
No permanent bonuses and promotions

blocks.text: Games Available at Billy Barker Casino CA

Billy Barkers Casino hosts only slot machines and wheels. Besides, the staff also organizes different lotteries, special offers for regular or certain category clients, and even sports betting options to offer a more diverse entertainment.
Slots
The lobby hosts approximately 140 classic 3x3 reeled slot machines and advanced video slots. The casino is proud of its jackpot slots from Powerbucks and BC Gold.
Powerbucks

These are multi-jurisdictional slots in Canada. They offer a static CA$1.000.000 jackpot for all offline and online players, as it also offers online slot machines. Due to the multi-platform integration, Powerbucks provides a progressive jackpot that both offline and online players can compete for. The minimum bets start at CA$ 0.50. All bets above CA$3 participate in the progressive jackpot rivalry.
Other Reliable Slot Providers

items: BC Gold
TwinWin

IGT

blocks.text: Some of them develop both offline and online gaming diversity.
Bonuses and Promotions at Billy Barker Casino

Currently, there are no casino promos. All the previous ones have expired. However, generally, the casino organizes several promos and schedules it on its calendar. Players can find it on the related official Facebook page at the Publication section.
Traditionally, the casino organizes such promos:

items: Hot seats for cash draw winners;
Bets on races (F1, horse races)
55+ client offers with discounts of menu dishes;
Lottery days;
Tournament pots;
You spin promos for Wheel players.

blocks.text: VIP offers

Along with promos, there is a static VIP client program. The VIP club is governed by the British Columbia Lottery Corporation for its submissive casinos in Canada. To join the club, players should visit the casino’s website, go to its slot’s section, and click “Find out more” or visit www.encorerewards.ca. There, players should register and meet the requirements to enjoy a number of perks:

items: A Welcome offer of CA$20 for free play;
Hotel discounts;
Birthday gifts for free plays;
Special hot offers and discounts;
Discounts for meals at the casino cafe and restaurant;
Exclusive packages for those moving to the next VIP level.

blocks.text: To promote one’s account, players should earn points for playing online and offline casino games. Other ways to boost the VIP card is to order certain food and beverages, enjoy the online platform games at PlayNow.com, participate in the casino games and promotions that promise free coins, or earn Base Points Accelerator, the percentage of which also depends on the current VIP club status:

items: 5% for double diamond members;
10% for triple diamond members;
15% for elite casino players.

blocks.text: In general, 1000 points give players CA$5 free play at both online and offline BCLC’s supervised casinos.
Deposits at Billy Barker Casino

Billy Barker Casino is a brick-and-mortar hall, so it accepts only cash and debit or credit cards like Mastercard or Visa. The minimum deposit sum is CAD 10. You need to go to the cashier, buy tickets for slots, and go to the lobby to participate in gaming.
Withdrawals at Billy Barker Casino
Just like with the deposits, the casino provides cashouts via Canadian currency. However, some winnings can be transferred to debit or credit cards. The minimum cashout sum is CA$ 10.
License Note

Billy Barker is a legal offline casino. It operates under the regulation of the British Columbia Lottery Corporation (BCLC). It meets the local gaming regulations, promising fair and transparent gaming. As the BCLC demands, the casino complies with the strictest security and responsible gambling demands. It has the seal of Game Sense on its website with its posts supporting the responsible gambling rules and support against the gambling addiction.
Billy Barker Casino App, Currencies, and Languages

Currently, the casino does not have a dedicated iOS or Android application to offer its games to online players. However, the casino has a website that introduces its main features, including the available games, promotions, and conditions of the loyalty club. It has a user-friendly interface, allowing simple navigation. Besides, there is another online website called Encore Rewards. This site is for all visitors who want to become VIP clients of the casino. They need to register on the site to learn more about the current offers, their conditions, and earn more points to climb up the loyalty club stairs.
Currencies Available

The casino operates offline, so it accepts only fiat currency. The only available currency is Canadian dollars. It is better to use the ATM services to cashout and be able to gamble without limitations.
Languages to Speak in Billy Barker Casino

Just like the main website, the casino primarily operates in Canadian English. However, it also has French-speaking casino helpers to favor the French-speaking Canadians. They are usually present at parties and big promo days.
Support at Billy Barker Casino
Speaking about the support, everything depends on what you are using. If you use the website, you can contact the online support via:

items: Email (info@billybarkercasino.com) to solve non-urgent disputes or clear out some booking details;
Phone (250-992-5533) for more urgent problem solving;
Fax (250-992-1103) for document delivery;
Website’s chat at www.encorerewards.ca to learn about the available coins at your account and how to redeem them.

blocks.text: If you visit the casino in person, you can ask its staff to help you clarify your inquiries.
FAQ about Billy Barker Casino
Does Billy Barker Casino operate legally in Canada?
Yes, the casino has the legal right to operate in Canada under the government of British Columbia Lottery Corporation ("BCLC").
What are the operating hours of the casino?

The casino is closed on all state days. Speaking about the business days, it is open daily. From Sunday to Thursday, the working hours are 10 AM - 10 PM. From Friday to Saturday, the working hours are 10 AM - 12 AM. There is also a Sunday Brunch from 8 AM to 1 PM.
How many games are there in Billy Barker Casino?
Currently, there are nearly 140 slot machines.
Who is eligible to play at Billy Barker Casino?
Players must be Canadian residents and be over 19 years old to participate in gambling. So they must be ready to introduce their IDs to prove their residency and age.
Can I have a snack or some rest on the casino territory?
Yes, there is a cafe, open for breakfasts, lunch, and suppers from 11 AM. Besides, there is a hotel with neat and clean rooms to book and stay at before or after gaming.
Where can I learn more about the Billy Barker Casino promos and bonuses?

Billy Barker Casino has a list of current and planned promos at its lobby. However, there is also a loyalty club website and an official page on Facebook, reflecting all the ongoing offers and discounts. So, you can visit them to learn more about the offers.

blocks.text: Billy Barker Casino Games: Things to Try and What Can Be Improved

Billy Barker casino operates in Quesnel, BC Canada as a brick-and-mortar gambling hall. So, all its games can be tested only in person after visiting its game hall. Currently, the casino hosts nearly 140 slot machines. Unfortunately, it does not have any card table games like poker or baccarat that are usually popular among Canadian players.
Slots
When entering the hall, you can be impressed with the choice of the available slot machines. They are different and vary in:

items: Layouts (3x3, 5x3; and more);
Themes (gods, Egypts, fairytale, fruit, etc.);
In-game features (fixed and progressive jackpots, free spins, etc).

blocks.text: The most popular game providers are Bally, IGT, Konami, and Aristocrat. The most popular slot machines are TwinWin and 88 Fortunes. The minimum and maximum bet sizes also vary to meet the needs of all players. Here, you can find slot machines with the following betting size requirements:

items: 1 nickel;
2 nickels;
5 nickels;
25 nickels;
CA$1.

blocks.text: Besides, the casino has jackpot slots from Powerbucks and BC Gold. Speaking about the Powerbuck, all players can compete for the fixed CAD 1.000.000 jackpot. If you are a highroller, the provider involves a competition between onland and online players. The reward is a progressive jackpot, but the stakes for it also rise and make at least CA$3 or more.
Wheels of Fortune

Except for slots, the casino also has a couple of wheels of fortune. You bet, spin the wheel, and learn the outcome instantly. This game usually belongs to the instant game section as players don’t need to play long card games to find out the results.
Other Games Your Won’t Find on the Website

If you visit the website, you will find only basic information about the casino’s slots. That’s it. However, it is not the only type of entertainment that can be found in this casino. If you subscribe to the official Facebook page, you will see other types of fun, such as:

items: Hot seats (players book their seats to participate in draws)
Sports booking options (generally, the casino accepts bets on horse races and motorcar races);
Lotteries like keno and others are very popular in this casino;
Special tournaments for VIP clients.

blocks.text: So, to learn more about the betting options in the Billy Barker Casino, you should subscribe to the newsletters and keep an eye on its calendar updates. The casino posts the monthly calendar of events and promos to keep its players informed about everything that it is taking or will take place in the casino.
Bonuses to Enjoy for Active Players
If you are a regular Billy Barker Casino, you can enjoy the perks of its loyalty club. There are four levels, based on the earned points:

items: One-diamond players (from 0 to 9.999 points)
Two-diamond players (from 10.000 to 49.999 points)
Three-diamond players (from 50.000 to 149.999 points)
Elite players (from 150.000 points)

blocks.text: Depending on the VIP status, players can enjoy a variety of perks such as a welcome offer for the new players (CA$20 for slots), special contests, hotel discounts, free play gifts on birthdays, customized special offers and discounts, discounts on meals and drinks in restaurant and lounge (10-15%), and exclusive upgrade packs.
How to Earn the Points?

There are several ways to earn the points to climb up the casino levels. The first way is logical. You need to play more, to earn more points. The second one is to participate in different tournaments and promos. The third way is to order meals and drinks at the casino buffet or restaurant. Finally, you can earn more VIP points by playing the games on PlayNow, as it is also powered by Billy Barker Licensing body British Columbia Lottery Corporation. It is a website where Canadians can bet to win and, parallelly, earn their points.
How to Use Points?

The earned points can be used only for casino games. So, you need to take your VIP card, insert into the fitting slot machine, enter your PIN, and bet, using the converted points. 1000 points will give you CA$ 5 in-game cash.
Responsible Gambling

Before visiting the Billy Barker Casino, you need to make sure you are eligible. Based on the Game Sense requirements, you must be at least 19 to gamble and not to be on the list of the self-exclusive list. You should be financially able to play and avoid chasing wins to prevent dependency.

Speaking about other rules, you must have your valid Canadian document about the residence and legal age. You should be properly dressed and behave respectfully, avoiding aggressive and offensive language, and wear gang items and clothing.
Takeaways

Even though the casino does not offer the desired diversity of games (no card games and live dealer tables), it has a great VIP program and regular promos and sports games to compensate for it. Follow the news on the website and Facebook to know more about the current offers.

blocks.text: Billy Barker Casino App: Mobile Access to Important Information

More and more casino players want to save memory on their smartphones. However, most high-quality apps take too much space and slow down the smartphone functionality. That is why many casinos refuse to launch their mobile applications and simply develop a website that can satisfy the needs of their clients.

Billy Barker is an offline casino, so there is no necessity to develop any application. Still, the casino has its user-friendly website with all the required details about the current promos, games, and other essential details.
Billy Barker Casino Mobile Website Interface

Billy Barker Casino has a dedicated website that functions well on both PCs and all iOS and Android devices. It looks a bit outdated but comprises all the required information. These are the sections that you can find on the website before visiting the casino in person.

items: The Hotel. Here, you can find information about all the rooms and the history of the hotel.
Restaurant. In this section, you will find three types of menu: breakfast, buffet, and main with the price for each dish and drink.
Casino. This section introduces the main types of the games available at the casino and the Code of Conduct for patrons.
Promotions. Here, one can find details about the ongoing promos like lotteries, draws, giveaways, and others.
Showrooms. If you need to book a room for some events, you can find the available rooms here.
Contact Us. This a page with all the contact information, including the email, phone number, official address, and fax.

blocks.text: Finally, at the bottom of the website, you can find details about the working hours, the responsible gambling, and VIP program for regular clients. So, it has all the necessary data for players who plan their visit to the Billy Barker Casino.
What concerns the gambling addiction, there is the link to Game Sense at the bottom of the page that can redirect you to the required information about the player’s protection.
Billy Barker Facebook Official Page

The casino also has an official website on Facebook. There, you can find more information on the events and promos that take place at the casino. The casino moderators also post photos of their winners to demonstrate their transparency and care for customers. The Facebook page is more dynamic as it updates all the information and involves the customers’ interaction in the comment section.
So, if you want to stay updated on the current casino situation, you should subscribe both to the casino website and Facebook page to receive all the required notifications first.
Casinos BC Website

While the Billy Barker Casino operates under the supervision of British Columbia Lottery Corporation, it supports the loyalty club program. While you cannot find the details about it on the website directly, you need to visit www.casinosbc.com/get-encore-rewards to learn about the loyalty program and the rules of becoming a loyal member.

There are four loyalty levels. Players can promote their VIP cards by playing slots, participating in other promos, and even ordering specific meals at the casino’s cafe and restaurant. The collected points are converted into bonus cash for free play. Generally, you can get CA$5 for 1000 points. When you arrive at the casino, you can insert the card, enter your PIN, and redeem your bonus cash to play slots.

To become a member, you need to visit the site and join the club via the registration. Afterward, you will be able to track personal progress in your personal VIP account and enjoy discounts and personalized offers.
Registration: Obligatory or Not?

As the casino operates exclusively offline, there is no need to register on its official website. However, if you want to earn some points and be able to redeem them in the casino, you should join the VIP club via the registration form. In your personal account, you will keep an eye on the amount of bonuses. Besides, you can earn more points by playing online games on PlayNow.com and your first CA$20 for completing the registration. PlayNow is a website where top games from all land-based casinos in Canada are collected. So, you can also play them with the need for download to earn your points and even hit the jackpot. Yet, if the online experience is not for you, then offline Billy Barker has over 140 slots for you.
Takeaways

Billy Barker Casino does not have an app but it has developed a dedicated website and a Facebook page to let its clients interact with each other and be able to keep in touch with the casino’s current events and promos. Besides, there is a website from the casino supervisor where you can register to collect points and convert them into play money in the casino.

blocks.text: Billy Barker Casino Login Process and Requirements

Billy Barker Casino is a legit offline casino in Canada. Being situated in Quesnel and surrounded by Billy Barker restaurant, cafe, and hotel, it offers great location facilities. Everyone, who arrives at a casino, can park a car, rent a room, and enjoy tasty meals in between. While almost all visitors can book a room or eat at a cafe, not everyone can gamble at Billy Barker Casino. Read the article to learn more about the rules to follow to gamble legally and safely.
How to Log In Billy Barker Casino
Billy Barker Casino operates offline, meaning you need to visit it in person to test the available games. To enter a casino, you need to take the following recommendations.
Eligibility
The first step is to make sure you are eligible to play at the casino. Speaking about the Billy Barker’s eligibility rules, they are the following:

items: Legal players are at least 19 years old;
All bettors must be Canadian citizens;
Everyone who wants to bet must be ready verify personality with the locally issued document;
One must be sober and properly dressed to enter the casino.

blocks.text: So, if you are a foreigner or do not have a required document to verify your identity, you will need to contact the casino support to find out if there is any way for foreigners to play casino games and bet on sports.
Clothes

The next thing to keep in mind is your appearance. Of course, it is not about your race or religion. It is about your look. There are certain rules that casino visitors must remember to enter the casino without any obstacles.

items: The clothes must be clean and neat.
It must not be vulgar or seen through.
There must be no gang logos or discriminating words.
Clothes can be casual but not beach related (sandals, swimmers, flip-flops, etc.) or bed-time (nightgowns, kigurumi, pyjamas, etc.)
Gang-related or sharp accessories are also not allowed.

blocks.text: So, before choosing the clothes items to visit Billy Barker Casino, you must be sure that it fits and does not contradict the casino’s rules.
Behavior and Personal Items

Finally, to enter a casino you must not belong to things that are prohibited for the casino visitors. These are items that can hurt others or look threatening to the casino staff and clients. As a rule, drinks, abusive substances, weapons, and sharp items are not allowed at the casino. Visitors can be scanned by metal detectors to make sure they bear no threat to other players and the casino staff.
Besides, the casino does not accept aggressive players or those being under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
Codes of Conduct at Billy Barker Casino
After logging in, the casino will demand you to follow its in-casino rules. Generally, the code of conduct includes the following rules:

items: Players must not abuse the casino staff and other players;
They must not scream or misbehave in any other way;
If the casino representative asks players to leave or show their belonging, they should do so;
In case of the repeated pandemics, all casino players must follow the safety rules;
In case of any emergency, the casino staff’s instructions must be followed;
Players should also not bring alcohol beverages or drugs to the casino or drink/smoke the prohibited substances at the casino entrance.

blocks.text: If the casino representatives see any sign of threat, they can ask players to leave. If any of the Criminal Code of Canada law is violated, the casino has the right to call the security and the police.
Other Players Who May Not Be Allowed

Billy Barker casino follows the rules of the Canadian Gaming Authorities and applies the rules of responsible gambling. Its website informs its clients about the addictive nature of games, meeting the Game Sense requirements. So, in case a player shows any signs of the addiction and maniac winning chase, they can be warned by the casino's staff. If the players are already on the Self Exclusion list, the casino will not accept them. So, their gaming history is also checked.

Another reason for being excluded from the loyalty club or the casino is the history of previous violations. If the above-mentioned rules have been violated before, the casino staff has the right not to accept such players. The casino caters for its reputation and the safety of other players.
Takeaways

Billy Barker Casino is a legal gambling hall with lots of positive reviews on Trip Advisor thanks to the available facilities. Such Canadian casinos do not want to spoil their reputation because of players who misbehave or violate other rules. So, before visiting this casino, make sure you have all the required documents, you are dressed properly, and there are no illegal or prohibited items and substances among your belongings.
